page.title: 12P.T.A. at the School
page.content: This school has a very active Parent-Teacher Association which holds approximately 2 events per term. These events have included a Summer Fair, Punch and Judy Show, Halloween Night with apple bobbing, Beetle Drives, Christmas Concert in the Church Hall and a sponsored walk which raised Â£200. Under the D.E.S. Scheme the parents bought the school a computer. One major project, in the past year has been the clearance and redecoration of the empty school house attached to the main building. The acquisition of this house has improved organisation in school by providing administrative accommodation thereby releasing the previous "all-purpose" room in the main building for group work, television, cooking, medicals etc. Parental help is encouraged and is freely and generously given.
